title: Why do we have teambuilder but not draft pick?
body:
???

Teambuilder is complete and utter horse sht. You wait 20 minutes for a game end up with a tank adc soraka.

replies.body: because we have ranked for draft pick.

You realise this entire game is balanced around draft pick? blind is basically broken in terms of balance, saying that ranked is for draft is literally so retarded, ranked is to play this game and receive a rank.

Normals are to play this game without the pressure of being placed in a rank, but should still be played in a balanced state as intended

GoldenTomato is well known as a non-troll type of girl. down to Earth human being and not afraid to go down and git dirty.

ehh I think that we are not allowed to play normal drafts because there aren't many people playing on OCE server compared to others so rito just wants us to focus rankeds if we want to play draft so that people don't complain about 50 minute waiting time for rankeds.

Way i see it, TeamBuilder is the great filter that gets rid of all the "i can only play X" players.
I do not like Teambuilder, but i see its use.

That said, i'd love to have draft here :/ i miss it...
